data.persona: I am a county hiker. I like to tramp through the forest. I love nature.
data.description:
You are in the Mountain Peak.
There are clouds beneath and above, the mountain range extends beyond in all directions barely visible through the fog. Everything is covered by snow and above is a bright blue sky.
There's an icicle, a path, a fog, a sky, and a clouds here.
The bighorn sheep is here.

You are carrying a stick.

data.short_motivation: I need food to survive at the top of the mountain.
data.mid_motivation: I need to get off this mountain and return to my family.
data.long_motivation: I need to teach my son to hike, hunt and fish.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: wield the stick to keep from falling off the side of the mountain.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield the stick to get to the top of the mountain.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: drop the stick to sit and take a break at the top of the mountain. Grab an icicle and use it for water, then see the bighorn sheep.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: hit the bighorn sheep with the stick and slow cook its meat over a small campfire near the top of the mountain.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow another bighorn sheep to prepare a meal for the following morning.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: go various points of the mountain summit to track and kill more bighorn sheep to ensure survival until the end of an incoming winter storm.
